name: tags
label: Tags
description: Hierarchical tags for organizing content related to liturgical life, spiritual formation, community activities, and theological topics in an Antiochian Orthodox parish.

terms.name: Liturgical Life
terms.description: Main category for liturgical practices and events.

terms.name: Liturgy
terms.description: Subcategory under Liturgical Life for various types of liturgical services.

terms.name: Divine Liturgy
terms.description: The central Eucharistic service of the Orthodox Church.

terms.name: Vespers
terms.description: Evening prayer service held in the Orthodox tradition.

terms.name: Matins
terms.description: Morning prayer service typically said before the Divine Liturgy.

terms.name: Compline
terms.description: Nighttime prayer service, often the last of the daily offices.

terms.name: Sacraments
terms.description: Subcategory under Liturgical Life for the seven sacraments of the Church.

terms.name: Baptism
terms.description: The first sacrament, symbolizing the washing away of sin.

terms.name: Chrismation
terms.description: The sacrament of confirmation, performed after baptism.

terms.name: Eucharist
terms.description: The sacrament of Holy Communion, the body and blood of Christ.

terms.name: Confession
terms.description: The sacrament of repentance and reconciliation with God.

terms.name: Anointing of the Sick
terms.description: The sacrament of healing and comfort for the ill.

terms.name: Marriage
terms.description: The sacrament of union between a man and a woman in the Church.

terms.name: Ordination
terms.description: The sacrament of consecration of a priest or deacon.

terms.name: Festal Cycle
terms.description: Subcategory under Liturgical Life for major feast days and seasons.

terms.name: Great Lent
terms.description: The most solemn period of fasting and prayer before Pascha.

terms.name: Pascha (Easter)
terms.description: The celebration of the Resurrection of Christ.

terms.name: Theophany
terms.description: Celebrates the revelation of Christ as the Son of God.

terms.name: Dormition
terms.description: The Feast of the Falling Asleep of the Theotokos.

terms.name: Nativity
terms.description: Celebrates the birth of Jesus Christ.

terms.name: Spiritual Formation
terms.description: Main category for spiritual growth and development.

terms.name: Prayer
terms.description: Subcategory under Spiritual Formation for various forms of prayer.

terms.name: Jesus Prayer
terms.description: A short prayer used in Orthodox Christian spiritual practice.

terms.name: Rule of Prayer
terms.description: A structured schedule of prayers and psalms for daily use.

terms.name: Prayer of St. Ephraim
terms.description: A traditional prayer used in the morning and evening offices.

terms.name: Mystagogy
terms.description: Subcategory under Spiritual Formation for deeper understanding of the mysteries of the faith.

terms.name: Catechism
terms.description: Teaching of the basic doctrines of the Orthodox faith.

terms.name: Faith Formation
terms.description: Educational programs for children and adults in the faith.

terms.name: Bible Study
terms.description: Study of Scripture within the context of Orthodox tradition.

terms.name: Asceticism
terms.description: Subcategory under Spiritual Formation for disciplines of self-control and spiritual growth.

terms.name: Fasting
terms.description: Abstinence from food and other pleasures for spiritual purification.

terms.name: Silence
terms.description: Practice of quietness to foster inner stillness and prayer.

terms.name: Humility
terms.description: Spiritual virtue of recognizing one's dependence on God.

terms.name: Community Life
terms.description: Main category for parish and group activities.

terms.name: Youth Ministry
terms.description: Subcategory under Community Life for youth-related programs.

terms.name: Sunday School
terms.description: Religious education for children on Sundays.

terms.name: Youth Group
terms.description: Activities and meetings for young people in the parish.

terms.name: Retreats
terms.description: Spiritual retreats for youth and families.

terms.name: Women’s Ministry
terms.description: Subcategory under Community Life for women’s programs.

terms.name: Bible Study
terms.description: Group study of Scripture for women.

terms.name: Prayer Groups
terms.description: Regular prayer meetings for women.

terms.name: Outreach
terms.description: Service and outreach initiatives led by women.

terms.name: Men’s Ministry
terms.description: Subcategory under Community Life for men’s programs.

terms.name: Fellowship
terms.description: Social and spiritual gatherings for men.

terms.name: Leadership
terms.description: Training and development for men in leadership roles.

terms.name: Service
terms.description: Volunteer and service opportunities for men.

terms.name: Senior Ministry
terms.description: Subcategory under Community Life for senior members.

terms.name: Pastoral Care
terms.description: Support and care for elderly and homebound members.

terms.name: Home Visits
terms.description: Visits to members who are unable to attend services.

terms.name: Social Events
terms.description: Events and gatherings for seniors.

terms.name: Parish Activities
terms.description: Main category for general parish events and activities.

terms.name: Events
terms.description: Subcategory under Parish Activities for specific event types.

terms.name: Services
terms.description: General services such as Masses and special liturgies.

terms.name: Weddings
terms.description: Marriage ceremonies celebrated in the Church.

terms.name: Funerals
terms.description: Rituals for the deceased in the Orthodox tradition.

terms.name: Special Masses
terms.description: Masses held for specific occasions or intentions.

terms.name: Fundraising
terms.description: Subcategory under Parish Activities for financial support efforts.

terms.name: Church Bazaars
terms.description: Fundraising events at the church.

terms.name: Benefit Concerts
terms.description: Musical events for fundraising purposes.

terms.name: Donations
terms.description: Encouragement of giving to the parish.

terms.name: Volunteer Opportunities
terms.description: Subcategory under Parish Activities for volunteer roles.

terms.name: Ushers
terms.description: Volunteers who assist during services.

terms.name: Altar Servers
terms.description: Volunteers who serve at the altar during liturgies.

terms.name: Hospitality
terms.description: Volunteer work involving welcoming and serving guests.

terms.name: Theological & Doctrinal Topics
terms.description: Main category for doctrinal and theological content.

terms.name: Dogma
terms.description: Subcategory under Theological & Doctrinal Topics for core beliefs.

terms.name: Holy Trinity
terms.description: Belief in the three persons of God: Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.

terms.name: Incarnation
terms.description: The belief that God became human in the person of Jesus Christ.

terms.name: Resurrection
terms.description: The belief in the bodily resurrection of Christ and all believers.

terms.name: Patristics
terms.description: Subcategory under Theological & Doctrinal Topics for teachings of the Church Fathers.

terms.name: St. John Chrysostom
terms.description: One of the most influential early Church Fathers.

terms.name: St. Basil the Great
terms.description: A key theologian and bishop of the early Church.

terms.name: St. Gregory Palamas
terms.description: A 14th-century theologian known for his writings on the hesychast tradition.

terms.name: Canon Law
terms.description: Subcategory under Theological & Doctrinal Topics for church regulations.

terms.name: Church Regulations
terms.description: Rules governing the operation of the parish and clergy.

terms.name: Clergy Roles
terms.description: Responsibilities and duties of priests, bishops, and deacons.

terms.name: Parish Governance
terms.description: Structure and management of the parish community.

terms.name: Cultural & Historical Context
terms.description: Main category for historical and cultural aspects of the Antiochian Orthodox Church.

terms.name: Antiochian Heritage
terms.description: Subcategory under Cultural & Historical Context for the history and traditions of the Antiochian Archeparchy.

terms.name: History of the Antiochian Archeparchy
terms.description: Historical background of the Antiochian Orthodox Church.

terms.name: Iconography
terms.description: Study and veneration of holy icons in the Orthodox tradition.

terms.name: Sacred Music
terms.description: Traditional music used in worship and liturgical settings.

terms.name: Orthodox Identity
terms.description: Subcategory under Cultural & Historical Context for the identity and values of the Orthodox Church.

terms.name: Ecumenical Relations
terms.description: Relationships with other Christian denominations.

terms.name: Interfaith Dialogue
terms.description: Engagement with other religious traditions.

terms.name: Ecumenical Patriarchate
terms.description: The spiritual center of the Orthodox world.
